channel.title: Rocket League News
channel.description: All the news of Rocket League here!

item.title: COMMUNITY TRAININGS
item.description: We want to try our best to cater to players of all skill levels, as well as provide Custom Training sequences and Steam Workshop maps that help teach our players a broad range of skills and mechanics!

item.title: NEW GAMEMODE - DROPSHOT
item.description: Another FREE mode is coming to Rocket League later this month! Dropshot is a brand new take on Rocket League gameplay as we introduce dynamic breakable floors and an electrified ball!

item.title: TOURNAMENT IN MALLORCA
item.description: A new tournament will be the next Monday 15 at the event of Mallorca Games. There will be matches of 1vs1, 2vs2, or 3vs3. Be ready for that!

item.title: RLCS SEASON 3 CHAMPIONSHIP
item.description: We want to try our best to cater to players of all skill levels, as well as provide Custom Training sequences and Steam Workshop maps that help teach our players a broad range of skills and mechanics!
